noise_request.source_claim: Treat an Ethereum block hash as a sandbox token by encoding it as a CIDv1 that uses the eth-block codec and a keccak-256 multihash.

assertions: A sandbox token can represent an Ethereum block by referencing the block hash through a CIDv1 eth-block codec plus keccak-256 multihash.
The same sandbox token format still requires verification against a trusted registry entry for the block hash.
